Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Maaluu kee xaylô maggal sittal hiddottaanaah (tirtirissan) Yallih taaqatak sin agxisseh
Rabi sin elelliiy magooqa guffu haytaanam fan
Kaadu nuimmah sarrah aaxigetton!ellecaboh ayroh digaala siinil obta waqdi
Tonna hinnay isin sin qambaltam asmatah aaxiginnitoonuy edde taniinimik waasimak tenen
Yalli xiibiteh diggah, jaciim deqsitta girá ablettoonumul
Kaadu diggah asmat le mablah tet abletton
Tohuk lakal diggah woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) isin addunyal edde agxitak sugten niqmatak esserimetton
